name: UpdateEnvFileSystemShortcut
description:
Updates a file system shortcut in a specified environment.

Use this tool to update the file system shortcut for a given environment by specifying the project and shortcut IDs.

parameters.name: file_system_shortcut_id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying the file system shortcut to be updated.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the project to access. Retrieve this by calling /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: shortcut_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the file system shortcut to update in the specified environment.

parameters.name: file_system_path
parameters.description: The path of the file system shortcut to update. Specify the full directory path as a string.

parameters.name: creation_timestamp
parameters.description: The timestamp when the shortcut was created. Format: ISO 8601 string.

parameters.name: shortcut_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type of the file system shortcut to be updated, such as 'document' or 'folder'.

parameters.name: reference_identifier
parameters.description: The reference identifier for the file system shortcut to be updated.

parameters.name: shortcut_href
parameters.description: The URL or URI of the file system shortcut to update.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this file system shortcut.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this file system shortcut.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
